Plot: A man is chosen by his world's creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.
Title: Noah
Actors: Russell Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, Ray Winstone, Anthony Hopkins
tomatoConsensus: With sweeping visuals grounded by strong performances in service of a timeless tale told on a human scale, Darren Aronofsky's Noah brings the Bible epic into the 21st century.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 16 nominations.
